org.treetank.io

Interface IBackend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BerkeleyStorage, CombinedStorage, JCloudsStorage

    public interface IBackend
    Interface to generate access to the underlaying storage. The underlaying storage is flexible as long as IBackendReader and IBackendWriter -implementations are provided. Utility methods for common interaction with the storage are provided via the IOUtils-class.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IBackend.IBackendFactory
      Factory for generating an IBackend-instance.
